title: Virtual Assistant (Marketing & Admin Support)
job_overview:
Marketing Support
Schedule and post content on TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

Create basic Canva graphics for posts and marketing materials.

Manage email marketing campaigns (Mailerlite, ConvertKit, or similar).

Upload and maintain website pages (WordPress/Elementor preferred).

Respond to social media comments and DMs using provided scripts.

???? Product & Course Support
Upload and organize digital courses on platforms like Teachable or Kajabi.

Create and format lead magnets (PDFs, flipbooks).

Set up automated email funnels and landing pages.

???? Administrative Support
Manage client inquiries, bookings, and follow-ups.

Prepare and send invoices using QuickBooks, Wave, or Stripe.

Organize customer databases and CRM.

Send onboarding documents to consulting clients.

Collect testimonials and feedback.
